DOC.brief_summary: Sleep quality important predictor healthy status , quality life life span . Sleeping problem affect 50 % ~80 % hemodialysis patient . Sleep quality related factor research hemodialysis patient discuss study globally . Previous study show insomnia , excessive daytime sleepiness ( EDS ) , sleep apnea syndrome ( SAS ) , restless legs syndrome ( RLS ) major cause poor sleep quality . There data show influential factor related sleep quality Taiwanese hemodialysis patient .
DOC.brief_title: Sleep Quality Related Factors Hemodialysis Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This study cross-sectional design purposive sample 2 different dialysis medical center Taipei . Two hundred hemodialysis patient meet inclusion criterion recruit .
DOC.criteria: Hemodialysis patient whose age ≧ 20 year old conscious clear . ICD9：585.6 Every week receives two three convention hemodialysis treatment three month . May communication Mandarin Taiwanese language . Patient caregiver willing participate study sign inform consent . Hospitalized hemodialysis patient recently one month . Hemodialysis patient conscious disturbance , blind dementia . Hemodialysis Patient refuse interview fill questionnaire .
